Headwear_FuzzyBeanie.name: Fuzzy Beanie
descriptionList: Soft textured red and black fuzzy knit design
Eye-catching statement piece with streetwear edge
Warm and cozy fit for colder seasons
One size fits most – stretchy and comfortable
sizingList: One Size Fits Most: Designed with stretchable material to comfortably fit a wide range of head sizes.
Snug & Secure: Flexible opening ensures the hat stays in place without being too tight.
Unisex Fit: Suitable for both adults and teens.
Head Circumference Range: Best fits 21 to 23.5 inches (53 to 60 cm).
Lightweight Build: Won’t feel heavy or bulky even with the layered texture.
keyDetails: Unique Shaggy Texture: Bold red and black blend with shredded yarn design gives a one-of-a-kind grunge or streetwear aesthetic.
Statement Accessory: Instantly elevates any outfit with its eye-catching cat ear silhouette and chaotic texture.
Soft & Cozy: Despite the wild look, the inner lining provides comfort and warmth for chilly weather.
Unisex Fit: Flexible design suits a wide range of head sizes and styles, from casual to cosplay.
Great for Photos & Events: Perfect for themed shoots, festivals, or bold everyday looks.
careInstructions: Spot Clean Only: Use a damp cloth with mild detergent to gently clean affected areas. Do not soak.
Avoid Heat: Keep away from dryers, radiators, or direct sunlight for extended periods to preserve the texture.
Do Not Iron: The fuzzy yarn and synthetic blends are not heat-safe.
Storage Tip: Store in a breathable fabric bag or on a hat stand to maintain shape and prevent matting.
No Machine Wash: The delicate fibers and shaggy construction are not suitable for machine cycles.

Headwear_CatEarBeanie.name: Cat Ear Beanie
descriptionList: Chunky ribbed knit with structured cat ear silhouette
Adorable yet edgy – perfect for playful cold-weather looks

sizingList: One size fits most (recommended for head circumferences 21”–24”)
Flexible knit allows comfortable fit without tightness
Sits securely over ears for added warmth
Ideal for various hairstyles including locs, curls, and braids
keyDetails: Bold cat ear silhouette for a standout look
Thick ribbed knit for warmth and structure
Stretchy, one-size-fits-most design
Soft interior for all-day comfort
Unisex style suitable for all hair types and lengths
careInstructions: Hand wash cold with mild detergent
Do not bleach
Lay flat to dry to maintain shape
Avoid wringing or twisting
Store in a cool, dry place when not in use
